specialists.narrative: Created index.html (navigation hub: welcome, docs, setup, launch) and learn.html (education: theory, mathematics, visual intuition, prerequisites). Followed exact color spec: #1a1a1a background, #ff6b35 accents, #ffffff text. Semantic HTML5, ARIA labels, keyboard navigation, 4.5:1 contrast. Used system fonts, flexbox, CSS grid. Professional, accessible, offline-capable.

Balancing educational content with clean interface
Making interface work offline after setup
solutions: Strictly followed color scheme, tested contrast ratios
Implemented semantic HTML, ARIA labels, keyboard navigation
Used only local resources—no CDN dependencies
